main event: An unidentified flying object was observed at Osan AFB, Korea, on 14 September 1957, exhibiting brilliant white light and moving erratically.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 10-15 minutes,The object was noted to have an erratic path and covered an estimated length of 3 miles,The light disappeared from view with distance,Weather conditions were clear with unlimited visibility,Some observers suggested it might be a weather balloon.
sighted object: unidentified flying object with brilliant white light
witness description: USAF Officers including Lt. Capt. Irdina
